      @PostMapping("/getProductById/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getProductById(@RequestParam("id") Long productId)
      This method returns only one product.
      Parameters:
      productId - the product's id which we use to search
      Returns:
      the product which has id = productId

      Parameters:

      Returns:
